root.name: CART Precision Racing
root.description: System Requirements:Minimum System Requirements:Processor: Intel Pentium 60MHzOperating System: Windows 95 or Windows NT Workstation 4.0 with service pack 3RAM: 16MB for Windows 95 or 12MB for Windows NTHard Disk Install Requirement: 30MB for Windows 95/NT (100MB recommended, 200MB for full-install)Optical Drive Speed: 4X CD-ROMMonitor: Super-VGA 16-bit colorInput Device: A mouseRecommended System Requirements:Audio: Sound Card with speakers or headphonesNetwork: 28K internet modemGraphics: A Direct3D compatible graphics cardInput Device: A joystick or steering-wheel controllerOptical Drive Speed: 6X CD-ROMProcessor: Intel Pentium 166MHz
